allow: Bash(PROVIDE_LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG python -c "from provide.foundation import logger; logger.info(''Testing with DEBUG level!'')")
Bash(FOUNDATION_LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG python -c "from provide.foundation import logger; logger.info(''Testing with DEBUG level!'')")

Bash(PLUGIN_PROTOCOL_VERSIONS="2,3,4" python -c "
from pyvider.rpcplugin.config import rpcplugin_config
print(''Protocol versions:'', rpcplugin_config.plugin_protocol_versions)
print(''Type:'', type(rpcplugin_config.plugin_protocol_versions[0]))
")
